events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been classified as a refund request following the customer's message regarding dissatisfaction with the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I will assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product for a refund?
My order number is 45321. The product is not as described on the website and doesn't work as I expected.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request. You will receive your money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your help and quick response. I appreciate you handling the refund promptly.
The refund process is now complete. Please check your bank account in a few days for the credited amount.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The support case has now been closed as the refund was successfully issued and no further action was required.
